episodes.name: In the Dark Night of the Soul It's Always 3:30 in the Morning
episodes.overview: America’s favorite morning news show is thrown into crisis when it becomes the news.

episodes.name: A Seat at the Table
episodes.overview: Alex engages in contract negotiations as she prepares to accept an award. Bradley is courted for a new opportunity.

episodes.name: Chaos Is the New Cocaine
episodes.overview: In a weekend of turmoil, TMS scrambles to prepare for its new future.

episodes.name: That Woman
episodes.overview: TMS experiences severe growing pains as it embarks on a new era.

episodes.name: No One's Gonna Harm You, Not While I'm Around
episodes.overview: A looming article threatens to upend the TMS power structure.

episodes.name: The Pendulum Swings
episodes.overview: TMS covers the California wildfires, while Alex and Bradley struggle to keep their relationship from going up in flames.

episodes.name: Open Waters
episodes.overview: Bradley is presented with an opportunity that could jeopardize her tenuous, newfound bond with Alex.

episodes.name: Lonely at the Top
episodes.overview: TMS celebrates the birthday of one of their own as the country struggles with a tragic event.

episodes.name: Play the Queen
episodes.overview: New alliances are formed and old bonds are revived as TMS is forced to reckon with its past.

episodes.name: The Interview
episodes.overview: TMS faces a fateful day as a plan to shake up UBA is set in motion.

episodes.name: My Least Favorite Year
episodes.overview: Controversy and betrayal strike TMS as a new year approaches. Alex faces a difficult decision.

episodes.name: It’s Like the Flu
episodes.overview: Stars struggle to accept new roles. The TMS crew comes together for an important dinner.

episodes.name: Laura
episodes.overview: Bradley covers the start of campaign season while Alex prepares for her big moment.

episodes.name: Kill the Fatted Calf
episodes.overview: A potential tabloid leak creates moral complications. A debate-moderator role becomes hotly contested.

episodes.name: Ghosts
episodes.overview: The UBA team head to Vegas, where past misdeeds continue to haunt them.

episodes.name: A Private Person
episodes.overview: TMS welcomes a new face. Bradley gets a surprise visit.

episodes.name: La Amara Vita
episodes.overview: Alex takes a trip to finally find closure.

episodes.name: Confirmations
episodes.overview: TMS races to report an unconfirmed story.

episodes.name: Testimony
episodes.overview: Alex and Bradley try to accept change as a new book promises shocking revelations.

episodes.name: Fever
episodes.overview: TMS covers a growing crisis that turns personal for Alex and Bradley.

episodes.name: The Kármán Line
episodes.overview: A bold proposal to shore up a financially-challenged UBA meets with opposition, as Alex and Bradley discover their autonomy has limits.

episodes.name: Ghost in the Machine
episodes.overview: Technical difficulties provoke chaos at UBA. Buried secrets surface as Alex forms a surprising alliance.

episodes.name: White Noise
episodes.overview: When a contract negotiation becomes public, the old and new guards clash. Chris takes center stage.

episodes.name: The Green Light
episodes.overview: The UBA Upfront brings everyone together for a party in the Hamptons. Bradley and Alex each revisit a problematic relationship.

episodes.name: Love Island
episodes.overview: Unexpected connections emerge while the world is in lockdown.

episodes.name: The Stanford Student
episodes.overview: A pivotal interview complicates the Hyperion-UBA deal. Stella debates whether to reveal her history with Paul.

episodes.name: Strict Scrutiny
episodes.overview: Harsh reality collides with an opulent night celebrating fashion. Cory and Bradley visit a crucial player in the potential sale of UBA.

episodes.name: DNF
episodes.overview: Alex and Chip disagree on how to manage rumors about her private life. Bradley begins an investigation that could upend the deal.

episodes.name: Update Your Priors
episodes.overview: A line is drawn as Alex and Bradley are forced to choose sides. Cory scrambles for stable ground.

episodes.name: The Overview Effect
episodes.overview: The Hyperion-UBA deal comes to a vote. Bradley faces her past as Alex considers her future in the new world order.

episodes.name: My Roman Empire
episodes.overview: As UBN prepares for the 2024 Games in Paris, an unexpected crisis throws the network into chaos.

episodes.name: The Revolution Will Be Televised
episodes.overview: Alex fights to prove her innocence. A ghost from the network's past surfaces with a disturbing story.

episodes.name: Tipping Point
episodes.overview: Alex is blindsided by a surprise reunion when she attends a conference on climate change. Bradley meets her source. Mia interviews for a promotion.

episodes.name: Love the Questions
episodes.overview: A breaking news story pushes the understaffed TMS crew to the brink.

episodes.name: Amari
episodes.overview: Chris confronts her past as online rumors swirl. Mia devises a new strategy.

episodes.name: If Then
episodes.overview: Stella prepares for a make-or-break 2024 Games presentation during tense talent negotiations.

episodes.name: Person of Interest
episodes.overview: Yanko and Bradley's loyalties are tested when Claire resurfaces.

episodes.name: The Parent Trap
episodes.overview: Alex and Cory confront the meaning of legacy. Bradley's investigation takes a dangerous new turn.

episodes.name: Un Bel Di
episodes.overview: A night at the opera provides cover for a secret rendezvous.

episodes.name: Knowing Violation
episodes.overview: Alex lays everything on the line to bring Bradley home.
